author: Patrick Tobler
title: nft-maker.io -> Full NFT platform
description: There's high demand for user-friendly NFT platforms & marketplaces on Cardano.
solution: We want to expand nft-maker.io to a point where it's not only a minting tool but also a **decentralized market place for multi-media NFTs**.
experience: Patrick, Peter & Fahim, a **Developer, SPO** and **two** **Designers**. We've successfully launched one of the biggest NFT sites on Cardano so far.
